channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A first-time buyer has decided to leave the home where she grew up in the outskirts of Birmingham for a new one in the nearby Shropshire countryside; Nicki Chapman shows her what the stunning county has to offer.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: Two families compete to guess the most popular answers to family-friendly survey questions, with a Canadian twist.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kim's Convenience
channel.desc: Before Janet can reveal her big news, she must survive the family singing festival at church; Mr. Kim gets attention for his new SUV.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch and Crabtree uncover a mysterious temple, which may be hiding ancient treasure.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Bates is taken aback when Vera threatens to expose old secrets which could bring down the Crawleys. Mary is the only one who can protect the family, but she pays a high price when she turns to Carlisle for help.
